description:
reference to an international standard describing a component.
Examples of formats for reference to IEC publications: | IEC 60147-1D (VI.1.5.1) (1978) = IEC publication | IEC/TC47(CO)797(5.1) (1981) = Publ. of Central office | IEC/TC47(Sec)797(5.1) (1981) = Publ of Secretariat |Examples of formats for reference to ISO publications: | ISO9999 (1985) = ISO publication | ISO/DP999 (1985) = Draft proposal | ISO/DIS9999 (1985) = Draft Intern. standard.
